merci_description: You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
merci_reclamation: For any claim, you can go to the "Modify my reservation" page with your reservation code.
password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
second_title_body: Travel or rent your property with complete peace of mind with Tayarim
services_description: We offer a range of services for both property owners and travelers
send_email: Your request has been successfully processed
send_email_confirmation: You will be informed by email of the follow-up given to your request
owner-description: We guarantee complete rent management of your property in order to offer you peace of mind and profits. Additionally, it is possible to benefit from a concierge service without opting for the rental management.
traveler-description: We will accompany you during your trip to guarantee a successful experience
clean-services-description: Each property is professionally cleaned and checked
price-services-description: We offer exclusive rates to provide you with the best value for your money
host-services-description: Our team is available 24/7 to help you with anything during your stay
properties-services-description: All our properties are pleasant and comfortable
picture-services-description: Our professional photographers will take care of your property to make it attractive
dashboard-services-description: You will have access to a personalized dashboard to manage your property
maintenance-services-description: We take care of the maintenance of your property
host-description: Our qualified team is at your disposal to ensure a successful experience
text-2: At Tayarim, we love nothing more than making sure my guests have the best possible experience while they're staying at my places.
text-3: I've been hosting on Airbnb for a few years, and I've had the pleasure of welcoming guests from all over the world into my home. I take pride in providing a clean and comfortable space for my guests to relax and unwind.
text-4: I believe that good communication is key to having a successful and enjoyable stay, so I always make sure to stay in touch with my guests throughout their stay and after they've left. So don't hesitate to reach out if you have any question or concern, I'm happy to help you in any way I can.
text-5: So if you're looking for a beautiful home and a friendly and welcoming host who will go above and beyond to make sure you have a great time, you've come to the right place!
answer-1: To book accommodation, simply select your location, arrival and departure dates, the number of people, and click on the search button. You will then be able to see available accommodations and book the one that suits you best.
answer-2: Tayarim offers a range of services for both property owners and travelers. For property owners, we offer property management, cleaning, maintenance, and promotion services. For travelers, we offer quality accommodations, cleaning services, dedicated hosts, and exclusive rates.
question-3: How will future tenants be chosen?
answer-3: During pre-booking, we ensure that tenants respect house rules and are trustworthy individuals.
question-4: How is the price of accommodations determined?
answer-4: The price of accommodations is determined based on various factors such as location, size, amenities, and services offered. We offer exclusive rates for our customers to provide them with the best value for their money.
